text: Arenaria nevadensis is a species of flowering plant in the family Caryophyllaceae. It is endemic to Spain. Its natural habitat is Mediterranean Matorral shrubby vegetation. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== nevadensis Category:Endemic flora of Spain Category:Matorral shrubland Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Pierre Edmond Boissier Category:Taxa named by George François Reuter
title: Arenaria nevadensis
